mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, USER_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCHEDULE_STATUS, FAMILY_ID, BUDGET, CATEGORY_ID ) VALUES ( SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate}, NVL(#{endDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{startDate}), -- END_DATE가 없으면 START_DATE로 설정 #{scheduleStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyId}, #{budget, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryId} )
